question: Satyagraha was started by Gandhi ji in 1919 to protest against the _____________?
explanation: The Rowlatt Act or Black Act was passed by the Imperial Legislative Council on 21st March 1919. It empowered the government to punish anyone without trial and judicial review. Gandhiji started the Rowlatt Satyagraha from Bombay and termed the British rule as "Satanism".
